awards.title: Mathematics Münster Full Grant Scholarship
awards.summary: The Mathematics Münster Master’s Scholarship is awarded to talented students who will contribute to the international research environment of the Cluster of Excellence Mathematics Münster at the University of Münster.

awards.title: High Honor Graduate
awards.summary: Students who complete the undergraduate program with a Grade Point Average of 3.50 or above are qualified as 'High Honors' graduates.

volunteer.summary: Undergraduate recitation instructor for the course Partial Differential Equations (MATH 358), conducting weekly recitation sessions with a primary focus on enhancing students’ comprehension of key concepts.

projects.name: A comparative analysis of GFEM and SUPG methods
projects.summary: Conducted a comparison of the GFEM and SUPG methods for convection-dominated convection-diffusion equations

projects.name: Compartmental models in mathematical epidemiology
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
